features: Lightweight warmth: Just the right amount of protection to keep you cozy without overheating
Breathable moisture management: The engineered mesh zones and soft wicking fabric keep you dry and your body temperature under control
Versatile comfort: With a seamless construction, it’s great for running, as well as other outdoor activities like skiing
Active fit: On tops and bottoms, Active fit is close fitting and lets you move. Not too tight, not too loose
Smart hood: Minimalist construction hood that fits without draw cords or pullers
Seamless Technology: The seamless construction increases the lightness, softness and comfort of the garment
